data.name: EventFormatBasic
data.value:
''' <summary> ''' Gets the event of $fullName$. ''' </summary> <MonitoredItem(nodeId: "$nodeId$", attributeId: AttributeIds.EventNotifier)> Public Property $fullName$() As $dataType$ Get Return _$fullName$ End Get Private Set(ByVal value As $dataType$) SetProperty(_$fullName$, value) End Set End Property
Private _$fullName$ As $dataType$

data.name: EventFormatCSharp
MethodFormatBasic
data.value:
''' <summary> ''' Invokes the method $fullName$ ''' </summary> ''' <returns>A <see cref="Task"/> that returns the output arguments.</returns> Public Async Function $fullName$($parameters$) As $returnType$
Dim response As CallResponse = Await Me.InnerChannel.CallAsync(New CallRequest With { .MethodsToCall = { New CallMethodRequest With { .ObjectId = NodeId.Parse("$parentNodeId$"), .MethodId = NodeId.Parse("$nodeId$"), .InputArguments = $inputArguments$ } } }) Dim result As CallMethodResult = response.Results(0) If StatusCode.IsBad(result.StatusCode) Then Throw New ServiceResultException(New ServiceResult(result.StatusCode)) End If
Return $returnValue$ End Function

data.name: MethodFormatCSharp
ReadOnlyValueFormatBasic
data.value:

Private _$fullName$ As $dataType$
